Name: Right door jamb of Qed-nes
Description: Right door jamb; bears a representation in relief of Qed-nes, facing right. He is wearing a shoulder-length wig with no parting and covering the ears, and a knee-length 'apron-fronted' kilt and knotted belt. The right arm, which is very short, is pendant, the right fist is clenched. The left arm is bent sharply with a thin staff in the left hand. The staff reaches from the shoulder down to the baseline.
